function.description: Calculate the interior angles of a pentagon based on given angle relationships.
function.name: calculate_pentagon_angles

A.description: The measure of angle A in degrees.

B.description: The measure of angle B in degrees.

C.description: The measure of angle C in degrees.

D.description: The measure of angle D in degrees.

additional_angle.description: An additional angle in degrees with respect to C.

function.description: Calculate the least common multiple (LCM) of two numbers.
function.name: calculate_lcm

function.description: Calculate the length between two points given their coordinates.
function.name: calculate_length

A.description: The coordinates of point A as a tuple (x_A, y_A).

C.description: The coordinates of point C as a tuple (x_C, y_C).

function.description: Calculate the diagonal of a rectangle given the lengths of two sides.
function.name: calculate_rectangle_diagonal
